name: A Shot in the Dark (Serenity's edge studio)
name_original: A Shot in the Dark (Serenity's edge studio)
description:
Locked in a dungeon and surrounded by zombies, you must fight to survive. Adding to the peril is that darkness that engulfs you. Distract the undead with the glow stick gun, shooting a projectile glow stick draws the enemies away from you. Take advantage of their distraction. You are equipped with a pistol, rifle, shotgun, and a glow stick gun. These items will protect you, use them wisely. The goal is to survive for as long as possible, good luck.

Instructions

Movement- mouse for aim/WASD to move

Pickups: Move over item

Shoot: left click

Change weapon: Pickup - default weapon is the pistol

Drop weapon: V

Weapons: Pistol, Shotgun, Rifle, Glow Stick gun

You can toggle between forward oriented movement and world oriented movement in the settings
